comment.author: 14673419@N00
comment._content: Photoreport Pietersberg, where during the war the art treasures of the Rijksmuseum were stored in a cave

comment.author: 19909418@N05
comment._content: Don't know if anyone noticed:  in the larger sizes of this photo, under the list of names of the Detachment of the Royal Marechaussee (Military Police) security personnel written on the wall, can also be read "National Art Treasures a.o. Night Watch of Rembrandt".  Wow!

comment.author: 39441507@N03
comment._content: I'm a member of a research and study group and would love to use this photo in a report I'm going to be writing up on a visit we did.
